title: Ticket #199: Handle leak in Windows hard kill
description:
The following code, in process_control.WINDOWS.cpp, leaks a handle if the TerminateProcess call fails: 

    HANDLE process = OpenProcess(PROCESS_TERMINATE, FALSE, pid);
    if (process == NULL) {
        dprintf(D_ALWAYS,
                "windows_hard_kill: OpenProcess error: %u\n",
                GetLastError());
        return false;
    }
    if (TerminateProcess(process, 0) == FALSE) {
        dprintf(D_ALWAYS,
                "windows_hard_kill: TerminateProcess error: %u\n",
                GetLastError());
        return false;
    }
    CloseHandle(process);
